title: Dazzling Solitaire Studs - Vaidurya Kundanalu
materials: G Color. Handcrafted with meticulous detail in our Hyderabad workshop.
features: Classic six-prong setting showcasing the brilliance of the solitaire diamonds. The timeless design makes these studs a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Secure and comfortable screw-back closure.
occasions: Special occasions. Perfect for both traditional attire like sarees and modern outfits.
description: Timeless elegance and exceptional sparkle. These solitaire studs are a valuable investment piece handcrafted with the finest materials. A symbol of enduring love and commitment. Made with the purest 22K gold for lasting luster and value. Showcases superior diamond quality.
